title: Game Crashes a Few Times before LoLClient opens right
body:
Alright, so I just started, like the game a lot (came from counter strike full of neo nazis and the like) and was surprised at how not salty it was. I like playing a game every day, but for some reason, whenever I click the icon on my desktop, a little info box pops up saying (ver badum) that "Another instance of the launcher is running, do you want to terminate it?" I click yes, but even when another one isnt running, it says this, not a huge problem, the game works fine. The big problem is when I am logging in, I enter in my password, and it loads, and then crashes instantly after.

Anybody know how to fix this?

replies.body:
I suspect your client may be frequently disconnecting from the platform service, causing it to both not come up and to crash entirely. This is most often caused by network setting local to you that may interfere with League establishing a stable connection to the server. I strongly suggest taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the most common solutions  for this.

Let me know if you have any other crashes after working through that guide.

As of right now, I downloaded the Hextech repair tool and things have been working fine, the funny thing is, i didn't change any settings, but if it does crash again, I'll check connection guide again.
Use the repair tool I think.
How do I access the repair tool?
